attributes.action: Bring back Concorde SST for the 2012 Olymipics in London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a crying shame that concorde was decomissioned, however I do understand that it is not economically viable but it can you think of a better way in which to open the London games in 2012.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
